FuncDef: The display port-mirroring bridge-domain bd-number command displays the configuration of a specified mirrored port in a bridge domain.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the bridge domain ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

Examples: Bd       Vlan       CAR     Type   In/Out   WithLinkHeader  Instance                         SliceSize
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Run the display port-mirroring bridge-domain command to to view the configuration of a specified mirrored port in a bridge domain. If the bridge domain ID is not specified, the configuration in all bridge domain is displayed. If the bridge domain ID is specified, the configuration in a specified bridge domain is displayed.
